name: Gospel Book
maker: Mesrop of Khizan, Hayrapet, and Mesrop of Khizan
description: Gospel Book; Mesrop of Khizan (Armenian, active 1605 - 1651), Hayrapet (Armenian, active 1615 - 1680s), and Mesrop of Khizan (Armenian, active 1605 - 1651); Isfahan, Persia; 1615; Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on glazed paper bound between wood boards covered with brown calf; Leaf: 23 × 17.1 cm (9 1/16 × 6 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig II 7; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

medium: Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on glazed paper bound between wood boards covered with brown calf
